metadata.title: Rehabilitation Advantage Rocker Knife with Rubber Handle
features: Utensil is made from high quality stainless steel and permanently attached to a durable rubber handle; dishwasher safe
Perfect for individuals with arthritis, hand tremors, Parkinson’s, or dexterity issues
Handle gives the user more control of the utensil; allows the user to eat independently
Textured handle helps provide a secure grip without adding extra weight to the utensil
Designed with smooth edges to prevent any accidental cuts; intended to be used with a rocking motion, not slicing
description: Rubber Handled Rocker Knife was specially designed for individuals who suffer from arthritis, hand tremors, and poor dexterity. The handle of this rocker knife is built up with textured rubber. Users will find a comfortable grip while gaining more control over the utensil. This utensil is easy to clean and is dishwasher safe. The lightweight design gives the user the same functionality of traditional silverware, but with the added benefit of a wider handle. This rocker knife was designed to add independence and convenience to anyone who struggles with regular utensils. ⚠ WARNING: Cancer and Reproductive Harm
